Description: Cornelian finger-ring, with integral oval bezel bearing no further decoration.
Curator's comments: On carnelian (=cornelian) use in ancient Egypt , see Aston et al, 'Stone' in P.T. Nicholson and I. Shaw, Ancient Egyptian Materials and Technology (Cambridge 2000): 26-7.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1891 / Illahun, Kahun and Gurob (p. 17, pl. XVII)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir William Matthew Flinders Petrie
